about_the_game:
In this charming game, players will be placed in a mysterious rectangular plate with red balls floating on it. Players need to move the ball flexibly.
The game graphics are concise and exquisite, creating a mysterious atmosphere that immerses players. The sound effect is crisp and pleasant, creating a tense and stimulating atmosphere for players. The operation feels smooth, allowing players to easily control the movement of the ball and enjoy the fun brought by the game.
Come challenge your reaction ability and skills, explore this amazing rectangular board, and experience the fun of the game!
Players need to control the ball on a flat table and roll it over all six pink squares.
Game operation mode
Mobile=WASD
